trans-unit.id: Unfortunately, we can not currently accept your purchase with this payment method. Please choose another payment option to complete your order.
trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, we can not currently accept your purchase with this payment method. Please choose another payment option to complete your order.
trans-unit.target: Diemžēl pašlaik nevaram pieņemt jūsu pirkumu ar šo maksājuma veidu. Lūdzu, izvēlieties citu maksājuma iespēju, lai pabeigtu pasūtījumu.

trans-unit.id: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.source: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.target: Lūdzu, noklikšķiniet šeit, lai mēģinātu vēlreiz.
